General.Name: H.G. Infra Engineering Limited
General.Description: H.G. Infra Engineering Limited engages in the road construction; and engineering, procurement, and construction business in India. It constructs and maintains highways, bridges, flyovers, and other infrastructure contract works. The company executes civil construction projects comprising extension and grading of runways, railways, and land development, as well as undertakes water pipeline projects. H.G. Infra Engineering Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Jaipur, India.
General.Address: Sheel Mohar Plaza, A-1, Jaipur, India, 302001
